name: Coolant Radiator Hose Y Connector, Coolant Hose Junction Compatible with Silverado Suburban Tahoe Avalanche Cheyenne Sierra Yukon Escalade (Upgrade Aluminum)
short_description: 1 unit of cast aluminum coolant tee with 3 clamps for select Silverado Suburban Tahoe Avalanche Cheyenne Sierra Yukon Escalade. Upgrade from plastic to aluminum
This hose connector connects about 3 inches off the water pump on the right side, and connects to the hose from the coolant reservoir, as well as one from the heater core at the firewall
The Y joint of the 3 hoses fits 2002-2006 Avalanche 1500, 2007-2013 Avalanche, 1999-2013 Silverado (including 1500 1500hd 2500 2500hd 3500 3500hd), 2000-2013 Tahoe Suburban 1500 2500
Also fits 1999-2013 Sierra (including 1500 1500hd 2500 2500hd 3500 3500hd), 2000-2013 Yukon (xl, xl 1500, xl 2500) and 2002-2014 Escalade (including ESV EXT)

short_description: 【Package Includes】2 × Heater Core Hose Connectors with Seal Ring; 2 × Disassembly Tools (5/8 inch and 3/4 inch); 2 × Stainless Steel Hose Clamps; 1× Grease;
【Reliable Sealing】Internal to the coolant hose connector is a corrosion-resistant EPDM rubber seal ring, providing reliable sealing performance;

【Reliable locking】Specially designed spring clip to securely lock the coolant connector to the heater core. In addition, 2 special dismantling tools are included for easy installation and removal of the connector;

【Corrosion Resistant Material】Our coolant connectors are made of 304 stainless steel for superior corrosion resistance and durability to maintain performance in harsh environments with high temperatures and frequent vibrations. The smooth surface of the connector ensures a clean flow of coolant, and with a quality coolant connector you get a long-lasting, low-maintenance solution;
